name: Sand Bar
text:
<p>

          Enjoy a delicious frozen drink at our Sand Bar while overlooking the beautiful Lake Harmony.</p>

 

 

          <div class="explore-info-icons" id="icons-col1">

          <ul class="icons-ul">

             <li>

            <i class="icon-li fa  fa-clock-o"> </i> Hours: Opening Memorial Day weekend!</li>

            

            </ul>

          </div>
